Reference : model

One of SoVisu+ Harvester’s main tasks is to convert the various formats originating from the source platforms into a common data model compatible with the Semantic Web standards.

Reference model

The target model used to represent scientific output in SoVisu+ is inspired by the ABES Science Plus model.

For more information about modeling choices and mapping with source formats, please refer to the Modeling working group reports.

Database Model

Here is an UML-like schema generated from the SQLAlchemy models.
